thread.title: Nikkei Up After China Rate Cuts, Signs Of Better Earnings
thread.title_full: Nikkei Up After China Rate Cuts, Signs Of Better Earnings - WSJ

author: Kosaku Narioka
title: Nikkei Up After China Rate Cuts, Signs Of Better Earnings
text: 0109 GMT [Dow Jones] Japanese stocks are up following China’s move to stimulate its economy and signs of better-than-feared Japanese corporate earnings. China’s central bank cut interest rates to support its economy. Over the past few weeks, fears of sharp slowdown in China dented stock-buying appetite. Also helping Japanese stocks are signs of better corporate earnings results. Hitachi Ltd. (6501.TO) is up 6.7% at Y734.5 after the company announced better earnings forecasts for the April-September half. Panasonic Corp. (6752.TO) gains 6.8% at Y1,428.5 following a Nikkei report that it is likely to post a 200...
